{"id":417401034,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1604663453,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/417401034/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int m = nums1.size(), n = nums2.size();\n        int target = (m + n) / 2;\n        bool even = ((m + n)%2 == 0)? true : false;\n        vector<int> final;\n        \n        int itr1 = 0, itr2 = 0;\n        double res = 0.00;\n        \n        while (itr1 < m || itr2 < n) {\n            if (itr1 >= m) {\n                final.push_back(nums2[itr2]);\n                itr2++;\n            }\n            else if (itr2 >= n || (itr1 < m && nums1[itr1] <= nums2[itr2])) {\n                final.push_back(nums1[itr1]);\n                itr1++;\n            } else {\n                final.push_back(nums2[itr2]);\n                itr2++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        if (even)\n            res = (double) (final[target] + final[target-1]) / 2.00;\n        else\n            res = (double) final[target];\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
